bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign of black ban 斑① , macules, developing on the skin. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry ai ye 艾 葉 quotes Shang han lei yao 傷寒類要 : 治婦人妊娠七月，若傷寒壯熱，赤斑變為黑斑，溺血 , “To cure women in their seventh month of pregnancy, if they have been harmed by cold and have a high fever, with red macules developing into black macules , and blood in their urine”.

② Pathological Condition of black macules or chunks appearing on one’s face that neither ache nor itch. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry xi er 枲耳 quotes Zhai xuan fang 摘玄方 : 面上黑斑：蒼耳葉焙為末，食後米 飲調服一錢，一月愈 , “ Black macules on the face: Bake cang er leaves over a slow fire and prepare a powder. After meals ingest 1 qian mixed with the liquid obtained by boiling rice. A cure will be achieved within one month”.
